body:
Comment 3 by **robfig@yext.com**: 
I ran this: 
CGO_ENABLED=0 godoc -http=:8080 -analysis=pointer

Didn't seem to help

2014/06/18 16:27:13 Building SSA...
2014/06/18 16:27:30 SSA building complete
2014/06/18 16:27:30 Computing implements...
2014/06/18 16:27:31 Extracting type info...
2014/06/18 16:27:48 Visit instructions...
2014/06/18 16:27:51 Visit instructions complete
2014/06/18 16:27:51 Extracting type info complete
2014/06/18 16:27:51 Running pointer analysis...
Internal panic in pointer analysis:
/Users/robfig/yext-gocode/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/pointer/analysis.go:219
(0x33f7d5)
	func.001: debug.PrintStack()
/Users/robfig/go/src/pkg/runtime/panic.c:248 (0x1942d)
	panic: runtime·newstackcall(d->fn, (byte*)d->args, d->siz);
/Users/robfig/yext-gocode/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/pointer/gen.go:499 (0x316767)
	(*analysis).genConv: panic(fmt.Sprintf("illegal *ssa.Convert %s -> %s: %s", tSrc, tDst, conv.Parent()))
/Users/robfig/yext-gocode/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/pointer/gen.go:987 (0x31ce03)
	(*analysis).genInstr: a.genConv(instr, cgn)
/Users/robfig/yext-gocode/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/pointer/gen.go:1236
(0x31fc5d)
	(*analysis).genFunc: a.genInstr(cgn, instr)
/Users/robfig/yext-gocode/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/pointer/gen.go:1299
(0x320520)
	(*analysis).generate: a.genFunc(cgn)
/Users/robfig/yext-gocode/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/pointer/analysis.go:284
(0x30ef59)
	Analyze: a.generate()
/Users/robfig/yext-gocode/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/godoc/analysis/analysis.go:514
(0x15193d)
	(*analysis).pointer: ptares, err := pointer.Analyze(&a.ptaConfig)
/Users/robfig/yext-gocode/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/godoc/analysis/analysis.go:457
(0x150b1e)
	Run: a.pointer(mainPkgs)
/Users/robfig/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:1445 (0x1dc50)
	goexit: runtime·goexit(void)
2014/06/18 16:28:20 Pointer analysis failed: internal error in pointer analysis: illegal
*ssa.Convert *code.google.com/p/gogoprotobuf/proto.structPointer ->
code.google.com/p/gogoprotobuf/proto.structPointer:
code.google.com/p/gogoprotobuf/proto.structPointer_GetRefStructPointer (please report
this bug)
